rows.label: tlk42300042_05_msg0002
rows.name:
We've received a report that an army of Ignas
is trying to storm Volda Fort, mo!

rows.label: tlk42300042_05_msg0003
rows.name:
At this rate, the soldiers in the fort
might be completely wiped out, mo!

rows.label: tlk42300042_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Even if I go to the Mercenary Group now,
I don't know how many troops they'll be able
to lend me... mo.

rows.label: tlk42300042_05_msg0005
rows.name:
You'll dispatch handpicked Blades
from the Hr√¶svelgr Mercenary Group, mo?!

rows.label: tlk42300042_05_msg0006
rows.name:
What a reassuring offer, mo!
I'll ask you to do it right away, mo!
